sectionTitle.subtitle: FAQ
sectionTitle.title: Any Questions? Answered
sectionTitle.paragraph: Here are answers to the most frequently asked questions about our services. If you don't find the answer here, please contact us.

question_1.question: What services does your platform offer?
question_1.answer: Our platform provides comprehensive tools for managing a driving school, including lesson booking, student progress tracking, schedule management, and instructor communication.

question_2.question: Can I customize the features to fit my driving school's needs?
question_2.answer: Yes, our software is flexible and can be tailored to the specific needs of your driving school.

question_3.question: Does the platform support online payments?
question_3.answer: Yes, our platform supports online payments, making it easier to manage course fees.

question_4.question: How can I track my students' progress?
question_4.answer: Our platform offers tools for tracking student progress, including performance reports and attendance analytics.

question_5.question: Can I integrate the schedule with my calendar?
question_5.answer: Yes, our platform allows for synchronization with popular calendars, such as Google Calendar.

question_6.question: Is your platform GDPR compliant?
question_6.answer: Yes, our software is GDPR compliant, ensuring the security of user personal data.

question_7.question: How can I manage my schedule of driving lessons?
question_7.answer: Instructors can easily manage their lesson schedules through a dedicated calendar view that allows for booking, editing, and canceling lessons.

question_8.question: Can I see the history of lessons with each student?
question_8.answer: Yes, instructors have access to the full history of lessons with each student, including notes and performance evaluations.

question_9.question: How do I track the mileage of vehicles?
question_9.answer: Instructors can log and track vehicle mileage directly within the platform, ensuring accurate records for maintenance purposes.

question_10.question: Can I communicate directly with my students through the platform?
question_10.answer: Yes, our platform allows instructors to send messages and notifications directly to their students.

question_11.question: How do I update my availability for lessons?
question_11.answer: Instructors can update their availability through their account settings, making it easier to manage bookings.

question_12.question: Is there a way to view my earnings from the lessons?
question_12.answer: Yes, instructors can track their earnings through the platform, with detailed breakdowns of completed lessons and payments.

question_13.question: How can I book a driving lesson?
question_13.answer: Students can book driving lessons through the platform by selecting an available time slot with their preferred instructor.

question_14.question: Can I view my progress in the driving course?
question_14.answer: Yes, students can view their progress, including completed lessons and skills assessments, through their personal dashboard.

question_15.question: How do I know how many lessons I have left?
question_15.answer: Students can check the number of remaining lessons directly in their account, along with a detailed history of all past sessions.

question_16.question: Will I receive reminders for upcoming lessons?
question_16.answer: Yes, students will receive push notifications and email reminders for their upcoming lessons.

question_17.question: How can I pay for my lessons?
question_17.answer: Students can pay for their lessons directly through the platform using various online payment methods.

question_18.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a booked lesson?
question_18.answer: Yes, students can cancel or reschedule a lesson through the platform, provided they adhere to the school's cancellation policy.
